籤詩版本二:
Ihlobo usuku olude kunawo wonke futhi wonke umuntu ukhathazekile ngokushisa nokucindezeleka
Izulu nomhlaba nazo ziyazi ukuthi abantu bafunani, nomoya ushaya umoya futhi kupholile ngokwemvelo
詩意:
Le hexagram ibonisa ukuthi wonke umuntu ukhathazekile ngokushisa.
Yenza noma yini oyifunayo.
解曰: Akukho ukungabaza mayelana nokuqhubekela phambili noma ukuhlehla. Ube nesikhathi esimnandi. Eyokukhempa? Asikho isidingo sokwenza izinto ngamawala.
籤詩故事一:
◇I-Kong Ming ingena eSichuan
UZhuge Liang (181-234), igama lokuhlonipha u-Kongming, wayengowokuzalwa eYangdu, eLangya (manje eyiYinan County, eSifundazweni SaseShandong), futhi wayengundunankulu kaShu Han (Liu Bei) ngesikhathi seMibuso Emithathu.
Nakuba uLiu Bei ewine i-Jingzhou, akwanele ukuhlukanisa uhlangothi olulodwa. U-Zhuge Kongming wayehlele ukuthwebula i-Xichuan ukuze andise indawo ka-Liu Bei. Ngalesi sikhathi, uLiu Zhang e-Yizhou wahlaselwa uZhang Lu enyakatho. U-Zhuge Kongming uthole ukuthi u-Liu Zhang wayefuna ukunikezela imephu ye-Xichuan ku-Cao Cao ukuze azivikele. Lapho u-Zhang Song (ongaphansi kukaLiu Zhang) ehlangana no-Cao Cao, ngenxa yokuthi u-Cao Cao wayezidla futhi edelela, uLiu Zhang wathatha imephu wabuyela e-Xichuan wadlula e-Jingzhou endleleni. U-Kong Ming ubevele emlindile endleleni futhi wamemela e-Jingzhou, kodwa akazange akhulume ngeSithombe se-Xichuan kwaze kwaba yisikhathi sokuhamba. U-Zhang Song wabonga u-Kong Ming ngobubele bakhe nokungenisa izihambi, ngakho wasinikezela Isithombe sika-Xichuan yena.
Indawo yase-Xichuan yayiyingozi futhi ingahlaselwa noma ivikelwe. Ngemva kwezinhlelo ezihlukahlukene zika-Kong Ming, i-Xichuan yaba indawo yokuzalwa kuka-Liu Bei.
(I-Kong Ming yayiphatha abantu ngesizotha futhi yathola kalula i-Xichuan efiselekayo.)
聖意: Thandazela izibusiso ekhaya futhi uzivikele (kunenhlanhla emashwa) Funa ingcebo, inhlanhla ebhizinisini, umshado ovamile, ukuzalwa kwabafana eLiujia, ukuthutha amasimu, izikelemu, ukulimala kwemfuyo, ukuthola abantu, amacala omphakathi. , ukufuduka, izinto ezindala ezilahlekile, izifo zasenyakatho, ukufisa izintaba namathuna
